con:testCase.name: Pain001_Camt055_All Level RFDD
con:testCase.con:description: TC will perform PAIN002 Cancel action at Message, PaymentInfo and Transaction level and validate Camt055 and Camt029 response for RFDD Payments

con:config.con:query: select distinct(CUSTOMERID),ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and length(customerID)='11' and BLOCKEDFORDEBIT='N' and BLOCKEDFORCREDIT='N' fetch first 2 rows only

con:config.con:query: SELECT TRANSACTIONSID , ENDTOENDID , PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, ISPC , FK_PROCESSINGLINEID FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#msgID}%'
SELECT TRANSACTIONSID , ENDTOENDID , PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, ISPC , FK_PROCESSINGLINEID FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#msgID1}%'
SELECT TRANSACTIONSID , ENDTOENDID , PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, ISPC , FK_PROCESSINGLINEID FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#msgID}%'
